data.title: Time California Track & Field Records
data.text:
By Rich Gonzalez

Editor, DyeStatCal/ESPNHS

Updated through 3 p.m. on June 9, 2012

Please send any corrections/updates along with supporting

documentation to DyeStatCal/ESPNHS Editor Rich Gonzalez

Abbreviations key

-=senior

*=junior

**=sophomore

***-freshman

c=converted from yards distance

^=time en route to longer race distance

i=indoor mark

A=altitude mark achieved above 3,000 feet
